title: How the attack on Iran could impact the global oil market and economy
summary_full: The U.S.-Israeli attack raises the risk of major oil supply disruption. Iran is the fourth-largest OPEC producer and sits on the critical Strait of Hormuz.
summary_public: The U.S.-Israeli attack raises the risk of major oil supply disruption. Iran is the fourth-largest OPEC producer and sits on the critical Strait of Hormuz.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: U.S.-Israeli attack raises the risk of major oil supply disruption

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: U.S.-Israeli attack raises the risk of major oil supply disruption
